name: Zakkart Cat Window Perch - 100% Metal Supported from Below - Comes with Warm Spacious Pet Bed - Cat Window Hammock for Large Cats & Kittens - for Sunbathing, Napping & Overlooking (White)
short_description: 【STURDIER DESIGN】Our cat window seat is made of 100% iron and holds up to 40 lbs. Its triangular-shaped arms supporting from below make window cat perch STAY PUT WITHOUT WOBBLING when cats jump on and off from all heights above and below. Our window cat bed allows for 100% UNOBSTRUCTED JUMP ENTRY and takes FULL ADVANTAGE OF THE SPACE in contrast to top mounted cables.

【MACHINE WASHABLE COZY BED INCLUDED】The deluxe bed is designed exclusively for our cat perch window and provides comfort, warmth and security thru stuffed wall and sherpa covered pad. Spacious enough for large cats stretch out comfortably and completely. NO CHEMICAL SMELLS GUARANTEED.

【PERFECT SUNBATHING SPOT】Cats love being up high to get a view of the birds, squirrels, and neighbors. Our cat hammock for window is an exceptional spot for soaking up the sun and napping as the roomy beds are SUPER comfortable. GREAT FOR sunroom, patio, French door, window sill and more.

【TAKE ONLY SECONDS TO ASSEMBLE】No tools are needed. Simply put together and attach to the window. Your cats can chill on their new cat hammock in just seconds! It would be a great gift for a cat person. Every kitty in town deserves to have one.
【CUSTOMER SERVICE STANDBY】We at Zakkart value our customer experience as the highest priority. If you are not happy with your order, please contact us for quick assistance.
【SUCTION CUP REPLACEMENTS for FREE】Please reach us through seller's page if suction cup replacements are needed.

name: Cat Window Perch, Cordless Cat Hammock, Foldable Cats Window Bed for Large Cats with 4 Strong Suction Cups, Solid Metal Frame and Removable Cushion Bed Cover
short_description: Fold Easily and Cordless Cat Hammock: This is a foldable cat window perch. When not in use, you can easily fold it up without having to remove and reattach to the window, saving space in your home. The cordless design of the cat window hammock allows your cat to move freely on the hammock, jumping up and down to explore other places without any annoying cords tripping or obstructing them

Large Comfortable Cushion Bed Cover: This cat window bed is upgraded with thickened fluffy cushion bed cover, which give cats more comfort and safety while sleeping on it. The reverse side is breathable mesh, suitable for summer use. The zipper design makes it easy to take down to change and clean. Our cat hammock for window provides ample space, measuring 25" x 13.4" x 8.3", making it perfect for large cats to relax and enjoy the view

Easy Installation: Its a very straightforward cat window perch that assembles easily without any need for further instructions. Just push in and click on the metal pipes, put on the cushion bed cover; attach the 4 upgraded strong big suction cups and stick on your window. Warm Tip: Be sure to press hard on the suction cups to squeeze out the air completely. ( To make sure the suction cups stick firmly to the window, soak them in hot water for 3 minutes to soften them.)

Strong and Sturdy Frame: Our window perch for large cats inside is crafted from sturdy metal and high quality fabric. Supported by 4 upgraded strong suction cups and thicker steel frame, it is safer and more stable, holding up to 40 lbs, the large suction cups hold the cat window hammock firmly in place. It won’t bend, break and deform whatever your cat jumps and stretch its body on the bed

360° Window Perch: Indulge your cat's love for sunbathing with our cat window seat. The comfortable bed provides the perfect lounging area for your cat to enjoy hours of relaxation while soaking up the natural light, enhancing their overall well-being and happiness.

name: Zakkart Cat Perch for Window Sill with Bolster - Orthopedic Hammock Design with Premium Hardwood & Robust Metal Frame - Cat Window Seat for Large Cats and Kittens - Dark Stained Wood Gray Bed, 24''W
short_description: 【No Suction Cups or Drilling Needed】 Ensure your window has a SLOT at least 0.5 inches deep for the perch to hook onto (hook thickness: 0.08 inch). The bracket is widely adjustable to fit various setups, with a maximum window sill depth of 9 inches. The perch can be moved from window to window by simply lifting it up.

【Machine Washable Bed, Replacements Available】 The cushion can be removed for cleaning, take off the bed, cold wash and low tumble dry, then reinstall. Replacement beds are available for purchase. Search: B0D5MDR2N5

【No risk of zip breakage】A sewn-in sleeve-style bed-to-frame attachment delivers a secure hold for long term use. The plush bed provides gentle support to your cat's joints and muscles, providing a secure and enclosed sleeping space to curl up and nap in the utmost comfort.

【Unobstructed View & Large Space Cat Lounge】Holds up to 40 lbs. With bed size: (L: 24'' x 15'', XL: 26.4'' x 15''). A clean hook-on mount that turns a window into your cat’s favorite spot without taking up floor space. ideal for renters and small spaces where floor space matters.

【Sturdy Build & High Quality Material】Our cat window perch is crafted from premium hardwood and robust metal frame. Rest assured that your cat can safely perch by the window without any wobbling or tilting.

name: K&H Pet Products Kitty Sill Cat Window Perch for Large Cats, Orthopedic Window Hammock Bed Holds 40LBS, Washable Cover, Kitty Windowsill Bed Seat for Indoors - Cream Fleece, Unheated, 14 X 24in
short_description: CAT WINDOW PERCH: Sturdy cat hammock for window offers a soft comfortable cat bed sleeping surface for all sized indoor cats to sunbath and view the outdoors and is washable for easy maintanence
STRONG & STURDY: Cat window bed is sturdy enough to hold large cats, supports up to 40 pounds and measures 14" x 24" to fit most cats and fits on most window sills
ALL DAY COMFORT: Super-supportive orthopedic foam base provides comfort for cats with arthritis or other joint issues by providing a firm yet soft window cat bed for your cat to sleep

QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY: No tools required for installation using the included adhesive strips, making this cat window seat perfect for any window in your home: it can also install with the more permanent included screws
MEASURE: This unheated cat perch for large cats requires a 24" long and 2" deep window sill for installation, legs each are 3/4" thick and hang 8" from window sill to bottom of legs
COLORADO BRAND YOU TRUST: Designed by K&H with OVER 25 years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products for pets
product_description: The K&H Kitty Sill is the ultimate cat window perch, combining strength, comfort, and versatility. It’s the perfect cat window hammock, cat window bed, or cat hammock for window-loving felines. Designed to hold up to 40 pounds, this window cat perch is ideal for large cats. Featuring orthopedic foam and an ultra-soft washable fleece cover, it creates a cozy cat window seat or window cat hammock for your kitty to bask in the sun. Choose the heated model for added warmth—its internal thermostats adjust to your cat’s body temperature for ultimate comfort. Installation is simple with hook & loop fasteners, or use the included screws for a secure window ledge for cats. Transform any window sill into a comfortable cat window seat for indoor cats. With the K&H Kitty Sill Cat Window Perch, your cat can enjoy a safe, cozy, and sunny windowsill cat perch! K&H heated products are safety certified, providing peace of mind with electrical safety standards that go beyond UL requirements; K&H doesn't just use safety-listed parts, we safety certify the entire product, ensuring unparalleled safety. Designed by K&H with over 25 years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products for pets, ensuring safe reliability and top-tier craftsmanship for pet parents.

Directions IMPORTANT Installation Note: When installing your kitty sill using the provided hook & loop adhesive strips, be sure to apply the strips to the windowsill and kitty sill, then SEPARATE the kitty sill from the windowsill and allow them SET SEPARATELY for 24 HOURS to allow the adhesive to cure. If this step is skipped your kitty sill could fall off the windowsill due to uncured adhesive. After the 24-hour waiting period you can safely mount the kitty sill to your windowsill for your kitty to enjoy.

name: 2PC Cat Window Perch Cordless Foldable Cat Hammock Bed for Window with Metal Frame and Reversible Cover, Large Suction Cups Window Resting Seat for Indoor Cats (Cat Bed, M-2PC)
short_description: 【Cordless Braced Frame】2pcs Zarotoo cat window perches are perfect for multi-cat households. Your cats will no longer have to fight for a window view. The cordless braced frame allows safe and easy jumping between hammocks. Its braced frame is made of sturdy metal, ensuring stability and durability while remaining easy to install.

【Foldable Cat Window Perch】Zoratoo cat perch is foldable and does not interfere with the daily use of closed curtains or blinds, making it an ideal space-saving solution. You can put it down when your cats want to nap or watch outside the window. Fold it up for privacy or to reduce clutter.

【2-in-1 Reversible Cover】The cover features two types of fabric: soft faux rabbit fur fleece which is perfect for winter use and breathable mesh cloth, ideal for summer use. It features a zipper, allowing you to easily switch between the two fabrics to suit different weather and remove for washing.

【Sunbathing Window Perch】Zoratoo foldable cat hammock is designed with your cat's natural instincts in mind, offering an ideal spot for your beloved furry friend to relax, enjoy the sun and take in the view.

【Accessories Replacement】We offer suction cups and accessories replacement. We prioritize our customers and are dedicated to creating a harmonious vibe for cats to explore at home. Please reach out to us for help.

name: Cat Window Perch with Tall Scratching Posts, Inside 46" Climbing Tree Hammmock Mounted with Suction Cups for Sleeping,Playing and Watching Birds
short_description: 1.Promotes Mental Stimulation: Cats love to watch the world outside. The cat window bed provides a perfect vantage point for your furry friend to observe their surroundings, gives them a bird's-eye view of the outdoor world,stimulating their curiosity and keeping them mentally engaged.

2.Secure & Stable: Our cat bed window hammock with scratching post attaches firmly to any window using three strong suction cups, providing a secure and stable spot for your cat to relax and enjoy the view. It can support a maximum load of 45lbs, ensuring safety for your furry friend.

3.Durable Construction: The Cat Window Perch features a built-in scratching post made of PVC material,provides an ideal scratching surface for your cat, helping to satisfy their natural urge to scratch and stretch while protecting your furniture.The cat hammock bed with high-quality pine wood, built to last. The sturdy frame provides stability and durability, allowing your cat to lounge and play without worry.

4.Adjustable Height: With a total height of 46 inches, this cat window tree is designed to accommodate various window sizes by remove or add posts. Adjust the height to create the perfect window perch for your cat, allowing them to relax comfortably while observing their surroundings.

5.Easy Installation and Clean: Setting up your cat's new favorite spot is a breeze. Simply attach the cat hammock tree to your window using the three included suction cups. The installation process is quick, so your cat can start enjoying their new hammock in no time.(PS:drill needed for hammock part) .The cushion is removable and easy to clean, ensuring a hygienic environment for your pet
